text: Gary Carr (born 11 December 1986) is an English actor, dancer, singer, and musician known for his works on screen and stage. He has had main character roles in BBC TV series Death in Paradise and US TV series The Deuce. He is also known for playing an American jazz singer named Jack Ross in the ITV historical drama Downton Abbey. Category:English entertainers Category:1986 births Category:Living people
title: Gary Carr
